channel.title: Maze Runner Server?
channel.description: So I am trying to figure out what I wanna make with all my new stuff I have just learned recently with maps and I had an idea to make maps and stuff that replicate maze runner movie maybe with some changes of course but the same concept of a huge ass maze. what are yalls thoughts and if not this what other unique different stuff would yall want to see I just want ideas for something challenging and fun. think outside the box.

item.title: Maze Runner Server?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“sini, post:4, topic:553099”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=672016.msg4494310#msg4494310 date=1440557187]
I want to see a server called deathscape. It’s basically runescape but with a twist every so often you just randomly die. Think of the difficulty here you are getting ready to complete monkey madness when all of sudden you get the message “you have died of dysentery” and find yourself in lumbridge. How often you die is random however you will not survive longer than 2 hours play time. That will make you think twice about pulling things out of the bank and force you to strategist how to manage your short timespan called life.
[/quote]

…[/quote]

get working on it for the official server, sini

Read full topic

item.title: Maze Runner Server?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

I want to see a server called deathscape. It’s basically runescape but with a twist every so often you just randomly die. Think of the difficulty here you are getting ready to complete monkey madness when all of sudden you get the message “you have died of dysentery” and find yourself in lumbridge. How often you die is random however you will not survive longer than 2 hours play time. That will make you think twice about pulling things out of the bank and force you to strategist how to manage your short timespan called life.

I’d play that

item.title: Maze Runner Server?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

legal issues didn’t stop rsps as a whole so that idea is still viable. I had the same idea with duels… 5$ entry per duel, 16 people per tournament, winner takes a certain percentage of the pot. rest goes into your pocket so you can f b*tches

Read full topic

That will make you think twice about pulling things out of the bank and force you to strategist how to manage your short timespan called life.

lol

Rodgerwilco:

I want to see a server where you can gamble irl money on duels. Obv it wont ever exist due to corrupt admins.

or because it’s illegal?

Read full topic
